bwwExcerpt: A strong Broadway in Chicago cast spins a sizzling Lion King from Ramsey's gravitas to the feistiness of Jaylen Lyndon Hunter, one of two actors playing young Simba. As the adult Simba, Darian Sanders grabs control of the narrative the minute he swings onto stage. He conveys the pain and self-doubt racking the character, but balances it with that sense of humor that makes Simba arguably Disney's best hero.
